title: Member Configuration
description: For member configuration. See examples in the folder https://github.com/route4me/route4me-curl/tree/master/Windows/MemberConfiguration

is_hidden_value.title: Is Hidden Value
is_hidden_value.description: If true, the config key value is hidden

can_unhide_value.title: Can Unhide Value
can_unhide_value.description: If true, the configuration key value can be visible
